Articles.Content:
Hi my name is Oli,

I'm from Germany and I'm new here.

I don't have the game yet but I hope I will get it soon at my b-day. I can't await to play the game.

I even made "KSP Note Paper" to short my waitning time.

Should be found in "KSP Fan Works".

Waiting...

Hello Oli, and welcome to the forums!

We have a very interesting and international community here. Hope your birthday is soon and that you enjoy the game as much as we do.

Happy landings!

Hello Scorch93!

I've scorched 94 Kerbals myself. Keep up the good work!
